sn14.17:4.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
sn14.17:4.9: and the witless with the witless.
sn14.17:5.1: In the past, too, sentient beings came together and converged because of an element. …
sn14.17:6.1: In the future, too, sentient beings will come together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.17:7.1: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.17:8.1: Sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
sn14.17:8.8: and the wise with the wise.
sn14.17:8.11: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element. …”
